law.catch_line: Insurance inspector to examine buildings annually.
law.text: The board of education shall cause every building to be carefully examined annually by a competent insurance inspector. The inspector shall make a written report of the result of his examination with recommendations.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 583, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3219a-4.
